summary:
- **Issue of 150,000,000 Performance Rights** (5-year expiry) as part of the Hook Lake Project acquisition (non-cash consideration).  
- **Issue of 18,000,000 Performance Rights** for executive/director services (non-cash consideration).  
- **Total ordinary shares on issue**: 234,898,898 (quoted).  
- **Unquoted securities include options and performance rights** (see 4.2 for full breakdown).  
- **Material terms**: Referenced in Notice of Meeting (23 June 2025) at [manhattcorp.com.au](https://manhattcorp.com.au/).  

*No capital raising, trading halt, or financial data disclosed.* Preference given to dilution impact from new performance rights.
